name: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End (Pre-Errata)
text:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY.
You can pay 1000 LP; send all cards in both players' hands and on the field  to the GY, then, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card sent this way.
